website_summaries.verdict: With a 500-pound weight capacity, this scissor lift raises machines, HVAC components, and automobile parts from 9-1/4" to 28-1/2" so you can work.
pros: Removable rubber mat to avoid slips
Good for working on machines, air conditioning units, auto, and motorcycle components, and moving heavy objects
cons: Be careful how hard you pull the release handle, because it drops very quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great lift table for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Welds look good. Time will tell about the hydraulic system. I had an issue with the swivel casters, but the supplier was great. (Thanks Mark!) I try to live by a policy of not judging a company due to any problem they may have - I judge them on how they resolve it. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Poor hydraulics, 1st unit failed after 1.5 months, second still OK
customer_reviews.text: Quality reflects the price - cheap. 1st lift table lost hydraulics after around 1.5 months. 250lbs just went unexpected down - a real security issue. Amazon was gracious and send me a replacement. The 2nd unit lasted for about 4-5 month, but started now to let go too. Even pumping up is getting more and more tricky! But be aware the hydraulic cylinder quality is very poor. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven of Sound

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great device, works as expected, it lifts heavy objects up making it easier to work on, IE: Air Conditioner, or move around and elevate to transfer from one place to another. As far as the release handle goes, if you pull to hard, the platform drops very quickly, so be gentle and let it down with minimal pressure on the release, be patient, it comes down nice and smooth. Love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: A good lift table
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought I had made a mistake as the lift did not work. Then I figured out how to bleed the cylinder and voila, happiness ensued. This is a very sturdy and heavy table and appears very well made. It does what I set out to accomplish with flying colors (blue). Assembly is brainless. I use it to lift cabinets I'm building so I don't have to bend over any more. The back likes that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for the garage. I lift slot machines pretty often and this is the answer to getting them from one location to another. So I am confident it will help me with many other items i move around. Well built and well priced compared to others. Update: although this table is great and helped me lifting heavy objects, I am sad to report it finally stopped lifting on the fourth year of owning it. Maybe they only last this long but still pretty bumbed out.
customer_reviews.author: Padrocks

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: we use this lift every day, it was a replacement for one used for 15 years, this one will NOT make it that long and cost more than the one I had to replace.....Chinese goods are just not made well at all, the packaging always is though, a 3 year old is the only one who can open things now.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! My bosses bought this for me as I am going on 61 and my back can no longer sustain 50# boxes lifting. This has been a great thing for me to have. I read the other reviews - some good, some very critical. Hey! You are buying something that costs very little and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Holman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and worked just like the directions said it would after bleeding the air and adding jack oil to the cylinder. I hope to use it soon to reinstall the rear suspension and engine in a car that I am restoring.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond N.

customer_reviews.title: Works as it is designed to. Nicer if all 4 wheels were casters
customer_reviews.text: The tool works well as it is designed to. Because Applicare Inc. uses it for wall ovens, It would be nice if the front wheels could be swapped out for casters. They are welded into place. I find that a movers dolly placed across the lift allows 30" wide ovens easier to handle CAREFULLY!.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Francis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Table seems to slip in height after 15 minutes or so
customer_reviews.author: Earl Mathiesen

customer_reviews.title: Nice but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but extremely heavy and can be hard to move The lift is nice, but I prefer a lighter one Tdelara
customer_reviews.author: Antonio F. delara

customer_reviews.title: GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Needs a lot of pumps to bring up to full height. Other than that...GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit for the money. Not as solid as more expensive units, but performs the function needed. Also, the handle is actually white and not blue as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, but arrived with a damaged caster, leaking ball bearings all over the place. Locating a replacement that fit was not easy, and another expense I hadn't planned on.
customer_reviews.author: rdnzl

customer_reviews.title: Great lift, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great lift, great price....going to use it to lift wine carboy bottles and fermenters.....had to build up a 5 inch platform on top to make it even with table so I could slide it from one to another.
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to hold generators and lawn mowers up ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold generators and lawn mowers up to make working on them easier. So far it has been a back and knee saver. At 63 years of age this body it not as forgiving as it was when young.
customer_reviews.author: George Caruthers

customer_reviews.title: great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great for lifting or lowering things into my truck. Much heavier than I expected but that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: USChiMar

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This works. I had to do what others did and fill the lifter with hydraulic fluid. It is a little slower than other hydraulic lifters that I have.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price and have found it to be as advertised
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Lift
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and easy to assemble handle. It is sturdier than expected and rises and lowers with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. The only problem was that it did not come instructions.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnna B.

customer_reviews.title: Why lift when you can use this.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, use it to load van with truck parts. Gets used every day and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Turfman

customer_reviews.title: this is a great mobile lift
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great mobile lift. Like others have said, it does drop after time, so if you need it to stay in position, you will need to block it. Pretty well made and heavy. For my use it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: The table worked very well when assembled, but quality control needs work. On arrival, one swivel caster did not swivel correctly because it was bent. The lift mechanism was misaligned because a missing retainer ring caused the main pivot pin to slip out of the bracket on one side (serious safety hazard). I have requested replacement parts and hope they arrive as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: The right equipment for the job!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ecellent addition to the companies transfering heavy boxes and materials from one location to another. Only if i can keep my child from messing with it thinking its a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E.

customer_reviews.title: Becomes a good motorcycle lift
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money and Prime shipping made a great deal better. I bolted some channel steel on the top and made it a motorcycle lift for dirt bikes, just added a wheel chock and bolted it to the top of the lift table frame. Comes apart easily for storage. I am buying three more since I have 16 bikes and always have two or three in some stage of disassembly. I have a movable motorcycle lift for less than $300 for all the parts and the lift itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Baker

customer_reviews.title: ... lb pinball machines around my house and it works great! No more scratching my hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I use this to lift 300 lb pinball machines around my house and it works great! No more scratching my hardwood floors. I am in the midst of a remodel and this was used multiple time to move furniture including an entertainment center, large oak kitchen table, large heavy benches, etc. It has paid for itself rather than having to get friends to come over to help me move things. It is heavy and assembly was a little over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: michael Corbett

customer_reviews.title: An Almost  Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Lift is of good quality. Works very well. I recommend it. A real back saver. On June 14, 2017 the bearing in one of the swivel castor wheels failed.This made the lift table unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: KB4FZK

customer_reviews.title: Fine example of Chinese workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad scissor lift but typical Chinese quality. The handle bolts were cross-threaded and seized. The casters were damaged and won't steer properly and the release handle is impossible to lower without rapid dropping. All in all a poor quality product
customer_reviews.author: Phatjules

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Worked so easy and smoothly and just ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Worked so easy and smoothly and just as described. Heavy and built well. Great product and company.
customer_reviews.author: HappySun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did realize the handle didn't fold. It will serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: ej oislander

product_meta.title: JLTC LT500 Mobile Scissor Lift Table, 500-Pound Capacity, 9-1/4-Inch to 28-1/2-Inch Height
product_meta.description: The JLTC LT500 Mobile Scissor Lift Table, a simple reliable lift table, can lift up to 500lb from 9-1/4” to 28-1/2”.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
